name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List
description: Project::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: etag
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#etag
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: etag=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#etag=
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of projects.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

projects = bigquery.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

projects = bigquery.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all projects by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each project, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all projects are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each result by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.projects.all do |project|
  puts project.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

all_project_ids = bigquery.projects.all.map do |project|
  project.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.projects.all(request_limit: 10) do |project|
  puts project.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all projects. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each project.
